src:
朱海君被撞讓肇事者走　被NONO罵慘
01 Nov 2019, 07:10 by 張詠淇
TVBS歡樂台《女人我最大》邀請藝人分享「2019年有多衰」，2018工作滿檔的海芬，共拍了6部電影，殊不知一到2019年，開始走衰運，到了3月海芬打開存款，跟媽媽說：「我要考慮來賣滷雞腳了。」她說原本敲定好的主持活動，都在一個星期前整個取消不辦，主持人藍心湄說「妳是衰運這麼大。」
朱海君則說，某一天外出時下大雨，從後車廂找到一把媽媽從日本帶回來的傘，沒想到去便利商店被偷走，要去買女兒的東西走在路上又被車撞倒，雖然無大礙，結果對方急著要去幫客人修水電，拜託朱海君不要報警，然後付醫藥費給她。水電工人一打開皮夾，被朱海君看到只有300元，朱海君覺得他很可憐，就想說算了，告訴對方快去修水電賺錢。沒想到回家後發現，剛剛摔到的手通通都是血。原本以為今天就這樣結束了，沒想到NONO回家時，手上提了兩大袋，對著朱海君說：「朱小姐，你到底又買了什麼? 」被NONO臭罵一頓，一直被碎念到上床睡覺。
更新時間｜2019.11.01 07:09
text:
Zhu Haijun was hit and let the perpetrators go.
01 Nov 2019, 07:10 by 张咏淇
TVBS Happy Taiwan "Women and I are the biggest" invited artists to share "how bad in 2019", Haifen, who worked full of 2018, took a total of six movies, but I don't know that by 2019, I began to decline, and in March, Haifen opened. Deposit, said to my mother, "I have to consider selling the chicken feet." She said that the original pre-scheduled activities were cancelled a week ago. The host, Lan Xinxi, said, "Oh, it is so bad." "
Zhu Haijun said that when he went out to rain a certain day, he found an umbrella brought back from Japan by a mother from the rear compartment. He did not expect to go to the convenience store and was stolen. The thing to buy his daughter was on the road and was knocked down by the car. Nothing serious, the other party is anxious to help the guests repair the water and electricity, please Zhu Haijun do not call the police, and then pay medical fees to her. When the water and electricity workers opened the wallet, Zhu Haijun saw only 300 yuan. Zhu Haijun thought that he was very pitiful. He wanted to say it, telling the other party to repair the water and make money. I didn't expect to go home and found that the hand that had just fallen was blood. Originally thought that this was the end of the day, I did not expect NONO to go home, put two big bags on the hand, said to Zhu Haijun: "Miss Zhu, what did you buy again?" was sweared by NONO, has been broken go to bed.
Update time|2019.11.01 07:09
